data.name: COME ALIVE!
data.detailed_description:
you just wanted to hang with your crush!


so how’d you end up stuck between them and your friends in your tiny dorm room watching a campy horror film?

And what happens when the movie comes to life?

...

This is not what you signed up for.



COME ALIVE! is a first person 2.5d mystery visual novel about a group of friends, where you play from several of their perspectives. Can you get to the bottom of why this movie has come alive? Or should you just roll with it and have fun?



  • A regular cast of normal characters
  • Definitely nobody dies ahaha
  • ~1 hour playtime
  • Original, dream-like art and music
  • Gamepad + keyboard/mouse support
  • For MacOS / Windows / Linux

data.short_description: when the campy horror movie you're watching with your crush comes to life, will you be able to survive the night?

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7 (SP1+) and Windows 10
  • Graphics: DX10, DX11, DX12 capable.
  • Storage: 230 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Hardware vendor officially supported drivers.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: High Sierra 10.13+
  • Graphics: Metal capable Intel and AMD GPUs
  • Storage: 225 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Apple officially supported drivers.
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Ubuntu 20.04, Ubuntu 18.04, and CentOS 7
  • Graphics: OpenGL 3.2+, Vulkan capable.
  • Storage: 280 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Gnome desktop environment running on top of X11 windowing system
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
